title: Recent advancements in carbon fiber-based sustainable electrodes for flexible and wearable supercapacitors
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2403-2443
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00146J, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Susmi Anna Thomas, Jayesh Cherusseri, Deepthi N. Rajendran
Synthesis and characterizations of carbon fiber (CF)-based nanocomposite/hybrid electrodes for flexible supercapacitors are discussed. Furthermore, the electrochemical performance evaluations of CF-based electrodes are reviewed.
